statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id < 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC, timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC, timestamp ASC
SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(*) AS occurrences FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY occurrences DESC
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_name FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_name
SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM SensorData ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value, timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT outlier_id, sensor_id, outlier_value, outlier_reason FROM Outliers WHERE outlier_value > 100;
SELECT AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND sensor_value < 30
SELECT outlier_id, outlier_value, outlier_reason FROM Outliers WHERE outlier_value BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY outlier_value ASC, outlier_id DESC
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING max_value > 100
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value, COUNT(*) AS data_points FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING data_points > 10 ORDER BY avg_value DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT timestamp, sensor_value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 2
SELECT * FROM outliers WHERE outlier_type = 'High'
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(sensor_value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(sensor_value) > 50
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 100 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(DISTINCT timestamp) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT timestamp) DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data JOIN anomalies ON sensor_data.sensor_id = anomalies.sensor_id
SELECT * FROM anomaly_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_value, timestamp FROM anomaly_data WHERE sensor_id = 10;
SELECT location, manufacturer FROM sensor_metadata WHERE calibration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT detection_id, sensor_id, anomaly_category FROM anomaly_detection ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT outlier_value, timestamp FROM outlier_data WHERE sensor_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM outlier_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM anomaly_data WHERE sensor_value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_value ASC;
SELECT anomaly_category, COUNT(*) FROM anomaly_detection GROUP BY anomaly_category HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_metadata WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company' AND calibration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(outlier_value) AS max_outlier_value, MIN(outlier_value) AS min_outlier_value FROM outlier_data WHERE outlier_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Temperature%';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value < 10;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_name ASC, sensor_value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Sensor%' OR sensor_name LIKE '%Meter';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data sd INNER JOIN quality_control qc ON sd.sensor_id = qc.sensor_id WHERE qc.status = 'approved' ORDER BY qc_id ASC;
